/opt/moose/openmpi/openmpi-1.6.5/clang-opt/bin/mpicc   -DLINUX -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -DNDEBUG -DNDEBUG2 -DHAVE_EXECINFO_H -DHAVE_GETLINE -O3 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names   CMakeFiles/graphchk.dir/graphchk.c.o CMakeFiles/graphchk.dir/io.c.o  -o graphchk  -L/home/karypis/local/lib  ../libmetis/libmetis.a -lm -Wl,-rpath,/home/karypis/local/lib
